snippet: When Kiva Ford returns from his job as a glass blower for a pharmaceutical company, he usually takes up his hobby: making glass goblets, Champagne flutes and flower vases.
abstract: Profile of Kiva Ford, glass blower for Roche Pharmaceuticals, and member of the American Scientific Glassblowers Society, who makes and repairs medical research apparatus; Ford's love of the craft has him blowing glass in his free time as well, making decorative objects and personal creations for fun.
lead_paragraph: When Kiva Ford returns from his job as a glass blower for a pharmaceutical company, he usually takes up his hobby: making glass goblets, Champagne flutes and flower vases.

headline.seo: Glass Is Jersey City Man’s Preoccupation
headline.main: Blowing Glass Is His Day Job, and His Other Job, Too
headline.print_headline: Blowing Glass Is His Day Job, And It’s His Other Job, Too
